snippet: A system built with a modified iPhone successfully regulated blood sugar levels in a trial with people who have Type 1 diabetes, researchers reported Sunday.
abstract: Researchers report that portable artificial pancreas built with modified iPhone successfully regulated blood sugar levels in trial with people who have Type 1 diabetes; artificial pancreas is latest version of device that researchers have been refining for several years; findings appear in New England Journal of Medicine.
lead_paragraph: A system built with a modified iPhone successfully regulated blood sugar levels in a trial with people who have Type 1 diabetes, researchers reported Sunday.

headline.main: Artificial Pancreas Shows Promise in Diabetes Test
headline.print_headline: Artificial Pancreas Shows Promise in Diabetes Test
